variable.name: G104
variable.description: BEER: AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK OVER COURSE OF YEAR, BOTTLE, CAN, GLASS (12 OZ) (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME). (DRINKS PER WEEK)

variable.name: G105
variable.description: BEER: NUMBER DAYS DRINK PER WEEK BOTTLE, CAN, GLASS (12 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME) (DRINKS PER WEEK)

variable.name: G106
variable.description: BEER: ON AVERAGE, LIMIT FOR NUMBER OF DRINKS AT ONE PERIOD OF TIME BOTTLE, CAN, GLASS (12 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME). (DRINKS PER WEEK)

variable.name: G107
variable.description: WHITE WINE (OR ROSE): AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK OVER COURSE OF YEAR - GLASS (4 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME) (DRINKS PER WEEK)

variable.name: G108
variable.description: WHITE WINE (OR ROSE): NUMBER DAYS DRINK PER WEEK (4 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME)

variable.name: G109
variable.description: WHITE WINE (OR ROSE): ON AVERAGE, LIMIT FOR NUMBER OF DRINKS AT ONE PERIOD OF TIME - GLASS (4 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME)

variable.name: G110
variable.description: RED WINE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK OVER COURSE OF YEAR - GLASS (4 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME)

variable.name: G111
variable.description: RED WINE: NUMBER DAYS DRINK PER WEEK - GLASS (4 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME).

variable.name: G112
variable.description: RED WINE: ON AVERAGE, LIMIT FOR NUMBER OF DRINKS AT ONE PERIOD OF TIME - GLASS (4 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME)

variable.name: G113
variable.description: LIQUOR: AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK OVER COURSE OF YEAR - COCKTAIL, HIGHBALL (1 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME)

variable.name: G114
variable.description: LIQUOR: NUMBER DAYS DRINK PER WEEK - COCKTAIL, HIGHBALL (1 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME)

variable.description: LIQUOR: ON AVERAGE, LIMIT FOR NUMBER OF DRINKS AT ONE PERIOD OF TIME - COCKTAIL, HIGHBALL (1 OZ) THERE ARE KNOWN INCONSISTENCIES. (E.G. AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK AND NUMBER OF DAYS DRINK PER WEEK IS NOT ALWAYS CONSISTENT WITH THE AVERAGE LIMIT OF DRINKS AT ONE TIME)

variable.description: BERKMAN: DO YOU HAVE AS MUCH CONTACT AS YOU WOULD LIKE WITH SOMEONE YOU FEEL CLOSE TO, SOMEONE IN WHO YOU CAN TRUST AND CONFIDE?

variable.name: G685
variable.description: HOW MANY TIMES PER WEEK DO YOU ENGAGE IN INTENSE PHYSICAL ACTIVITY? (ENOUGH TO WORK UP A SWEAT)

variable.name: G686
variable.description: WHAT IS YOUR OCCUPATION NOW?(IF WORKING OUTSIDE THE HOME LESS THAN 20 HOURS/WEEK PUT RETIRED OR HOMEMAKER. SPECIFY PART-TIME IF ONLY WORK PART- TIME. CODE YOUR OCCUPATION ACCORDING TO ATTACHED SHEET) THIS VARIABLE WAS NOT COLLECTED FOR OFFSITE EXAMS (G436 = 1 OR 2)
variable.value: SKILLED LABOR (e.g. PLUMBER, CARPENTER, PAINTER, HAIRDRESSER)
GENERAL LABOR (e.g. CUSTODIAN, DELIVERY, MAILMAN, TRUCKDRIVER)
FULL TIME SELF EMPLOYED BUSINESS OWNER
FULL TIME PSYCHOLOGIST/SOCIAL WORKER/MENTAL HEALTH COUNSELOR
FULL TIME SKILLED LABOR (e.g. PLUMBER, CARPENTER, PAINTER, HAIRDRESSER)
FULL TIME GENERAL LABOR (e.g. CUSTODIAN, DELIVERY, MAILMAN, TRUCKDRIVER)
FULL TIME HEAVY LABOR (e.g. CONSTRUCTION, LANDSCAPING)
PART TIME SELF EMPLOYED BUSINESS OWNER
PART TIME PSYCHOLOGIST/SOCIAL WORKER/MENTAL HEALTH COUNSELOR
PART TIME SKILLED LABOR (e.g. PLUMBER, CARPENTER, PAINTER, HAIRDRESSER)
PART TIME GENERAL LABOR (e.g. CUSTODIAN, DELIVERY, MAILMAN, TRUCKDRIVER)
PART TIME HEAVY LABOR (e.g. CONSTRUCTION, LANDSCAPING)
